Choe Thae Bok Meets Indian Ambassador
   Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with N. T. Khankhup, Indian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
